todos.title: Competitive Advantage
todos.body: Show your patents, proprietary technology, etc.

todos.title: Growing Industry
todos.body: Show that you are in an emerging industry.

todos.title: Market Opportunity
todos.body: Show that the product can support a billion dollar market capitalization.

todos.title: External Forces
todos.body: Need to understand what else is going on in investors lives so you don’t ask for money at a bad time.

todos.title: Team
todos.body: Need to show who is committed to the team.

todos.title: Scarcity
todos.body: Make the deal scarce so that investor considers the risk of losing the opportunity to another investor.

todos.title: Live Vicariously
todos.body: Make investor feel that they would become part of the team and could be involved in all of the perks.  Need to identify perks.

todos.title: Reputation
todos.body: Know who is in the investor’s inner circle.

todos.title: Technical Exposure
todos.body: Investor needs to understand product (have some technical background) and have previous exposure to the industry.

todos.title: Recognition
todos.body: How will this deal help the investor gain recognition in the industry.

todos.title: Relationships
todos.body: Demonstrate your relationships with strategic partners.
